info.name: Cingulate sulcus
info.description: The cingulate sulcus curves over and immediately dorsal to the cingulate gyrus on the medial aspect of the cerebral hemisphere. Posteriorly, a marginal branch extends toward the superior surface of parietal lobe, demarcating the posterior boundary of the paracentral lobule.
info.item: /Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/Lateral to Medial/4 Parasag: Lat to Med
/Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/Medial to Lateral/1 Parasag: Med to Lat
/Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/1 Sag Thin Sec
